content:
Sure, here are some insider tips and tricks for finding affordable accommodations in Paris:

1. Look for accommodation outside of the city center, which can be much cheaper, but still allow you to experience Paris life. Areas like the 18th and 20th districts or suburbs like Saint-Ouen and Pantin, etc.

2. Consider staying in a guesthouse or B&B as it can be a great alternative to hotels and can save up to 50% or more often.

3. Book in advance for the best deals. The more lead time you have, the more affordable options you will have.

4. Use a travel credit card that offers rewards points or discounts.

5. Take advantage of last-minute deals by checking online booking and accommodation websites regularly.

6. Talk to locals - They often know the ins and outs of affordable accommodation, including furnished apartments and cooperative housing options.

7. Be flexible with your travel dates to take advantage of seasonal promotions often available in low seasons.

8. Always book directly with the property owner or manager. Avoid using booking sites like Booking.com or Expedia as their mark-ups often result in inflated prices.

By making use of these insider tips and tricks, you can save money and find the best deals for accommodations in Paris.
